meanings.definition: Capable of being counted or enumerated.
meanings.sent1: The denumerably apples in the basket were easy to count.
meanings.sent2: She organized the denumerably books on the shelf alphabetically.
meanings.sent3: The denumerably cookies in the jar seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: The denumerably stars in the sky twinkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The denumerably students in the classroom made it easy for the teacher to take attendance.

meanings.definition: In a manner that can be counted or listed.
meanings.sent1: She arranged the flowers denumerably in rows.
meanings.sent2: The items on the grocery list were denumerably checked off.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped denumerably as the sun rose.
meanings.sent4: The leaves fell denumerably from the tree in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops tapped denumerably on the window pane.
